title: On low priority queue BECAUSE OF BAD SERVERS
body: ok riot so you fuck me up in the game enough not letting me join, i finally manage to get into it and WIN going positive then i get on low priority queue?? seriously... Please remove it, i am so close to uninstalling this free to play game im only here still because of my friends honestly.

replies.body:
I don't have any issues with the servers.

Check your connection.
